response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your business operations or personal endeavors. Given its unique features and benefits, I estimate its value to be well above $8,000. I am extending this exclusive opportunity to you with an offer of $12,000. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the potential return on investment you might experience. I trust that you will find the product's capabilities to be invaluable. Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information to make a decision.", "product_price": 12000}
